greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of rooted trees with n nodes such that k equals the maximal number of subtrees extending from the same node and having the same number of nodes; triangle T(n,k), n>=1, 0<=k<=n-1, read by rows.
comment: T(n,k) is defined for n,k >= 0.  The triangle contains only the terms with k < n.  T(n,k) = 0 for k >= n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..200, flattened
maple: g:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0, add(
binomial(g(i-1$2, k)+j-1, j)*g(n-i*j, i-1, k), j=0..min(k, n/i))))
mathematica: g[n_, i_, k_] := g[n, i, k] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i < 1, 0, Sum[Binomial[g[i - 1, i - 1, k] + j - 1, j]*g[n - i*j, i - 1, k], {j, 0, Min[k, n/i]}]]];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 1, 14}, {k, 0, n - 1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 27 2019, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 02 2018
